about_the_game:
Meanders Map Pack: The Risefalls


Generally speaking it is no surprise that parts of the world should undulate wildly, soaring to great and jagged spires shrouded in mist and thunderous storm - and dipping to lush, greener lowlands and valleys - with extremes of all kind and terrains ranging from ice to mountain, to jungle to desert. Trek these heights with their ravines and chasms and delve into the upper and lower parts of the land where literally anything could be dwelling - tucked away on a mountainside, or slumbering not far from the edge of the road. Dizzying drops and hard going of all kinds await those who would leave the comforts of well-travelled roads and venture amid the Risefalls. Icy Caverns and Ravines, Glacial Rivers and dynamic Exits/Entrances for major encounters, Rickety and Unsure Crossings, Lowland Caves and Entrances, Cliffs, a Desert and Jungle Ziggurat Temple, Teeming Jungles with Perilous Drops and Treacherous Mountain Passes and Spires allow the action to reach new heights and depths.

Featuring 24 ready-to-go maps - The Risefalls offers new heights and depths to your adventures.

  • 1 Winding Mountain Chasm/Harpy Nest Path
  • 1 Mountain Spire
  • 1 Desert Ravine
  • 1 Desert Valley Temple Entrance with River
  • 1 Desert to Ocean Ziggurat Blender
  • 2 Lowland Mountain to Forest Blenders
  • 1 Mountain to Ice Summit
  • 5 Forest Valley Caverns with Roads
  • 2 Lowland Forest Savannah
  • 1 Winding Ice Mountainside
  • 1 Ice Mountain Valley Cave Entrance
  • 2 Ice Ravine inc one with River
  • 1 Ice Valley Cave Entrance
  • 2 Jungle Ravine with Bridge
  • 1 Jungle Ziggurat with Waterfall
  • 1 Jungle Valley River outflow and Fortification

Maps are sized specially for FG at 1350x900 and under 500 kb each to help prevent slow-down during play. DM Convenience is the focus with carefully labelled maps and several ways to access, use and choose the maps in this module. Use the VISUAL MAP SELECTION PANEL and pick your map from the thumbnails and yellow label by clicking on the pin. Or use the RANDOM ROLL TABLE - a d100 table to pick your destination at random.

Converted by: Kris Mc Dermott

Released on December 27, 2018. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.6 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.
detailed_description:
Meanders Map Pack: The Risefalls


Generally speaking it is no surprise that parts of the world should undulate wildly, soaring to great and jagged spires shrouded in mist and thunderous storm - and dipping to lush, greener lowlands and valleys - with extremes of all kind and terrains ranging from ice to mountain, to jungle to desert. Trek these heights with their ravines and chasms and delve into the upper and lower parts of the land where literally anything could be dwelling - tucked away on a mountainside, or slumbering not far from the edge of the road. Dizzying drops and hard going of all kinds await those who would leave the comforts of well-travelled roads and venture amid the Risefalls. Icy Caverns and Ravines, Glacial Rivers and dynamic Exits/Entrances for major encounters, Rickety and Unsure Crossings, Lowland Caves and Entrances, Cliffs, a Desert and Jungle Ziggurat Temple, Teeming Jungles with Perilous Drops and Treacherous Mountain Passes and Spires allow the action to reach new heights and depths.

Featuring 24 ready-to-go maps - The Risefalls offers new heights and depths to your adventures.

  • 1 Mountain Spire

  • 5 Forest Valley Caverns with Roads
  • 2 Lowland Forest Savannah
  • 1 Winding Ice Mountainside
  • 1 Ice Mountain Valley Cave Entrance
  • 2 Ice Ravine inc one with River
  • 1 Ice Valley Cave Entrance
  • 2 Jungle Ravine with Bridge
  • 1 Jungle Ziggurat with Waterfall
  • 1 Jungle Valley River outflow and Fortification

Maps are sized specially for FG at 1350x900 and under 500 kb each to help prevent slow-down during play. DM Convenience is the focus with carefully labelled maps and several ways to access, use and choose the maps in this module. Released on December 27, 2018. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.6 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
